name: Allied Warpriestess
effect: Class BonusAllied Warpriestess gets +1. Memory 4+On Attack: Recover 2. (To recover, remove that many damage counters from your champion. Apply this effect only if there are four or more cards in your memory.)
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] Allied Warpriestess gets +1 power.
[Memory 4+] On Attack: Recover 2. (To recover, remove that many damage counters from your champion. Apply this effect only if there are four or more cards in your memory.)

name: Backstep
effect: Target unit becomes distant. (Units stay distant until the end of their controller's turn.) Draw a card.
effect_raw:
Target unit becomes distant. (Units stay distant until the end of their controller's turn.)
Draw a card.
flavor: Any good demolitionist knows to take a few steps back before admiring their own handiwork.

name: Cremation Ritual
effect:
As an additional cost to activate this card, sacrifice an ally.
Draw two cards.
effect_raw:
As an additional cost to activate this card, sacrifice an ally.
Draw two cards.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: 'As an additional cost to activate this card, sacrifice an ally you control.' -> 'As an additional cost to activate this card, sacrifice an ally.

flavor: Embellished by flames, the former warrior's mighty countenance bred conviction in their compatriots.

name: Force Load
effect: Choose a fire or norm element Bullet card from your material deck with memory cost 0 and load it into target Gun weapon you control. (As a weapon is used for an attack, all of its loaded cards are put into the attacker's intent.)
effect_raw: Choose a fire or norm element Bullet card from your material deck with memory cost 0 and load it into target Gun weapon you control. (As a weapon is used for an attack, all of its loaded cards are put into the attacker's intent.)

rule.description: When a weapon is used for an attack, all of its loaded cards are put into the attacker's intent. In the case of Force Load, it allows more than one Bullet cards to be loaded at once and fired at the same time.

flavor: Factory Recommendation: one round per shot.

result_editions.effect: 從你的素材庫選擇一張回憶代價為 0 的火屬性或無屬性 Bullet 牌，接著將其裝填至目標由你操控的 Gun weapon 中。
result_editions.flavor: 雖然不是馬卡龍，就算你合格吧<3

effect: Class BonusThis card costs 1 less to activate. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.) At the beginning of your recollection phase, recover 1. (To recover, remove that many damage counters from your champion.)

name: Hypothermia
effect: Target rested ally gets -4 until end of turn.
effect_raw: Target rested ally gets -4 life until end of turn.
flavor: Rest once, and you may never rise again.

result_editions.effect: 目標待命狀態的 ally 獲得 -4 直到回合結束。

name: Imperial Recruit
effect: Foster (At the beginning of your recollection phase, if this ally hasn’t been dealt damage since the end of your previous turn, it becomes fostered.) Imperial Recruit gets +1 as long as it's fostered.
effect_raw:
Foster (At the beginning of your recollection phase, if this ally hasn’t been dealt damage since the end of your previous turn, it becomes fostered.) 
Imperial Recruit gets +1 power as long as it's fostered.

rule.description: Once this ally on the field is fostered, it can't be fostered again.
The Foster triggered ability will trigger even if that ally did not exist on the field for a full turn cycle.

result_editions.effect: 培育 只要 Imperial Recruit 被培育時，他獲得 +1。
result_editions.flavor: 「教祖大人呢？」「出門購物了。」       「獨自一人！？」

name: Increasing Danger
effect: Draw a card. Each player draws a card into their memory.
effect_raw: Draw a card. Each player draws a card into their memory.
flavor: First, an ember. Then, a blaze.

name: Lurking Assailant
effect: Lurking Assailant has stealth as long as it's awake. Level 1+Lurking Assailant may retaliate against attackers while not defending.
effect_raw:
Lurking Assailant has stealth as long as it's awake.
[Level 1+] Lurking Assailant may retaliate against attackers while not defending.

rule.description: Lurking Assailant's [Level 1+] ability allows it to retaliate against attackers even if that attacker isn't attacking Lurking Assailant. For example, if the opponent is attacking your champion with an ally, Lurking Assailant can retaliate. During that damage step, your champion will take damage from the attacking ally, and Lurking Assailant will deal damage to that attacking ally.

flavor: Some assassins prove their skill with a dagger, others prove it with a glib tongue and twisted schemes.

result_editions.effect: 只要 Lurking Assailant 為備戰狀態，他便具有潛行。 Level 1+當 Lurking Assailant 並未進行防禦時，他可以對攻擊者進行反擊。
result_editions.flavor: 這座城市正需要你這樣的審問官。

editions.effect: 只要 Lurking Assailant 為備戰狀態，他便具有潛行。 Level 1+當 Lurking Assailant 並未進行防禦時，他可以對攻擊者進行反擊。
editions.flavor: 這座城市正需要你這樣的審問官。

effect: Glimpse 1+X, where X is the amount of domains you control. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.) Floating Memory

name: Potion of Healing
effect: Brew — Two Herbs (You may sacrifice the listed objects rather than pay this card's reserve cost.) Sacrifice Potion of Healing: Recover 5. (To recover, remove that many damage counters from your champion.)
effect_raw:
Brew — Two Herbs (You may sacrifice the listed objects rather than pay this card's reserve cost.) 
Sacrifice Potion of Healing: Recover 5. (To recover, remove that many damage counters from your champion.)

rule.description: When paying the Brew cost, modifications to the card's reserve cost is ignored. Other additional costs such as 'as an additional cost to activate this card, sacrifice an ally', is not ignored.

result_editions.effect:
釀造 — 兩個 Herbs

name: Resolute Stand
effect: Level 2+You may activate this card without paying its reserve cost. If you do, skip your next draw phase. If target unit would be dealt attack damage this turn, prevent 3 of that damage.
effect_raw:
[Level 2+] You may activate this card without paying its reserve cost. If you do, skip your next draw phase.
If target unit would be dealt attack damage this turn, prevent 3 of that damage.

rule.description: If multiple effects have a player skip the same phase, that player must skip that phase multiple times. For example, if two Resolute Stands were activated by a player without paying its reserve cost due to its ability, that player skips their next two draw phases.

result_editions.effect: Level 2+你可以不支付此牌的封存代價使用此牌，若你如此作，跳過你的下一個抽牌階段。 如果目標單位將在本回合受到攻擊傷害，防止該來源的 3 點傷害。
result_editions.flavor: 你以為自己是被太陽燙傷的？

name: Study the Fables
effect: Target player reveals six cards from their material deck. Draw a card into your memory.
effect_raw: Target player reveals six cards from their material deck. Draw a card into your memory.

rule.description: The target player chooses which cards to reveal from their material deck. If there are less than six cards in their material deck, all of those cards must be revealed.

flavor: Perhaps the answer lies within Azoth's many myths.

result_editions.effect: 目標玩家展示其素材庫的六張牌。抽一張牌到他的回憶區。
result_editions.flavor: 呵呵...那代表你遇過的魔獸還不夠多。

name: Varuckan Acolyte
effect: On Enter: Destroy target regalia with memory cost 0. Level 3+Varuckan Acolyte gets +3.
effect_raw:
On Enter: Destroy target regalia with memory cost 0. 
[Level 3+] Varuckan Acolyte gets +3 power.

rule.description: Varuckan Acolyte's On Enter ability does not specifically target a regalia that you don't control. This means that if you control the only regalia with memory cost 0, that regalia must be the target for this ability.

flavor: Some of the cabalistic rituals practiced among the mad cultists require material sacrifice.

result_editions.effect: 參戰時: 消滅目標回憶代價為 0 的 regalia。 Class BonusVaruckan Acolyte 獲得 +3￰。
result_editions.flavor: 難怪辦公室裡只有她...呃，只需要她。

name: Windrider Vanguard
effect: Class BonusVigor (This unit wakes up at the beginning of your end phase. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] Vigor (This unit wakes up at the beginning of your end phase. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor: The stalwart vanguard of Camelot's airborne forces are chosen for their affinity for wind.

result_editions.flavor: 不是「陪她玩遊戲」，你就是她的遊戲。
